channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
im in Dire need of an expert whos Messed with Clients for a long time, or has great knowledge of them.
What i need help with.
i need help with Movement, I wanna switch the keys around, So the Arrows keys are movement, And the mouse is your viewing camera.
Also need help with the Viewing camera, i wanna move it from the 3rd person view it currently has to a over the shoulder view.
i also need help with removing the current Gameframe of which ever server i use, 317 or 474, And replace with a custom Interface.
If any of these are possible. please Reply.
Thanks in Advanced, Strangle

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Strangle Strangle
item.description:
@Strangle wrote:

Nah that wasnt me sorry, i dont not own a rl account

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @GkCha0z GkCha0z
item.description:
@GkCha0z wrote:

this on rl was posted not so long ago so i just thought since its basically the same

Not sure where I will end up taking this, but I was bored so I decided to do this Took me a couple hours but it pretty function as of now.

Features
-Character is moved with AWSD
-Camera is above shoulder(third person)
-A and D rotate
-W moves you forward based on which way your looking

Need to Do
-Make the camera rotate when you use A and D, rather then snap into place
-Make movement easier to use
-Make it so when you press t, you can chat.

Read full topic
